channel.title: [Final]FroyoScape (w/o Combat) - A taste of Frogurt - A must have! - New DLs!
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt][b]FroyoScape - A taste of Frogurt[/b][/size]
[img]http://sphotos-f.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/422261_187879541354824_575956742_n.jpg[/img][/center] [center]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CetCq6xOxlo[/center]
Many people have been messaging me and commenting asking me why i quit this development. The answer? Financial issues, our gradual loss of support, and the loss of the hope of the staff. FroyoScape was up for around seven months, staying only in the programming stage and having switched bases over five times. This Hyperion source, fortunately, stayed with us for a full four months (From January till the end) and I believe it is great what we did and, if people took the time to improve this, this source could be the next, something! This may be a small topic, but it has big potential, and I hope, whoever gets this source will be able to mark out its full potential, hopefully.
[center][img]http://puu.sh/1ZEqC[/img] [img]http://img203.imageshack.us/img203/9531/runningenergysystem.png[/img] [img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/6789/levelupinterfaces.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/24FWs[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2g0qd[/img] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0nQaiYlt93c[/youtube] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sK9zGxnfXAE[/youtube] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TjJ9OPiMXaA[/youtube] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KH-xVxRxrAU[/youtube][/center]
The main release (Server + Client): [URL=http://up.ht/11rallU]FroyoScape.rar - 18.5 MB[/URL]
If any of you would like some of the concepts we were thinking, and the thread pictures (Like the Server Update pictures), feel free to have this file also: [URL=http://up.ht/11ramGr]Topic Things and Ideas.rar - 815 KB[/URL]
Sincere Regards, Arham

item.title: [Final]FroyoScape (w/o Combat) - A taste of Frogurt - A must have! - New DLs!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“old coder old, post:39, topic:517751”]Nice. I am downloading now.

EDIT: so i downloaded it and all but i am stuck here.

the error when i run the server.

Jun 25, 2013 4:13:26 AM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Jun 25, 2013 4:13:26 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Jun 25, 2013 4:13:26 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... Jun 25, 2013 4:13:26 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready Jun 25, 2013 4:13:26 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading definitions... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/thoughtworks/xstr eam/XStream at org.hyperion.util.XStreamManager.<clinit>(XStreamManager.java:26) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World.init(World.java:259) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.<init>(RS2Server.java:56) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:40) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) ... 4 more Jun 25, 2013 4:13:26 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 9399 object definitions. Jun 25, 2013 4:13:26 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading map... Jun 25, 2013 4:13:27 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 1166825 objects. Jun 25, 2013 4:13:27 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Jun 25, 2013 4:13:27 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loaded 11525 definitions. Jun 25, 2013 4:13:27 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.content.Weight build INFO: Loading item weights... Jun 25, 2013 4:13:27 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.content.Weight build INFO: Loaded 7948 item weights. Jun 25, 2013 4:13:27 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.container.Shops loadShops INFO: Loading shops... Jun 25, 2013 4:13:27 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.container.Shops loadShops INFO: Loaded 0 shops. [/quote]
So sorry, I didn’t link the run.bat with all the jars. And even when you fix that you will get an error.

My suggestion, please use an IDE.

Read full topic

item.title: [Final]FroyoScape (w/o Combat) - A taste of Frogurt - A must have! - New DLs!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:34, topic:517751”][quote author=Flamo353 link=topic=636018.msg4307279#msg4307279 date=1370109669]
So you’re showing us that your server has working food that will actually heal your health, an interface to display what your run percentage is currently at, and an skill leveling interfaces? Seems like things that would come with your base, and if it didnt, 317 is so easy to create customs on. I honestly don’t know what’s special about this server.

Server Features:
Working Run Interface
Working level up interfaces
Food that heals you
[/quote]I’d like to see you create a custom running system.[/quote]
Did you see my quote?

Read full topic

item.description:
@CoderJessee wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:29, topic:517751”][quote author=Flamo353 link=topic=636018.msg4307279#msg4307279 date=1370109669]
So you’re showing us that your server has working food that will actually heal your health, an interface to display what your run percentage is currently at, and an skill leveling interfaces? Seems like things that would come with your base, and if it didnt, 317 is so easy to create customs on. I honestly don’t know what’s special about this server.

Server Features:
Working Run Interface
Working level up interfaces
Food that heals you
[/quote]
Okay Mr.Flamingo.

Oh, and btw.

[quote author=Flamo353 link=topic=628531.msg4306097#msg4306097 date=1369846339]
Server is a 667/728, I have the same question, I would like to change the IP to my local, but I don’t know which file I’m supposed to edit to do so.
[/quote][/quote]
Lmao
